invocations.description: Returns true if the server supports servercount(). This is mostly used to make scripts compatible with OT servers. For more information on servercount() see this
invocations.ex:
if $hasservercount then
	print(servercount("mana potion"))
else
	print(itemcount("mana potion"))
end
invocations.exDescription: This action script will check if the server supports server count. If it does it will print the servercount of mana potions. If it does not it will print the itemcount of mana potions.
